hadiths.text: Abdur Rahman bin Yazid Al-Ansari and Mujamma bin Yazid Al-Ansari said:that a man among them who was called Khidam arranged a marriage for his daughter, and she did not like the marriage arranged by her father. She went to the Messenger of Allah and told him about that, and he annulled the marriage arranged by her father. Then she married Abu Lubabah bin Abdul-Mundhir

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ زَوَّجَ ابْنَتَهُ وَهِيَ كَارِهَةٌ
chapter.eng-name: One who arranges his daughter’s marriage when she is unwilling
